name: Trash Planet (Sleepy Studios)
description:
You've accidentally been left behind in a waste recycling unit somewhere in the middle of space. You'll need to find your way out while navigating through the various recycling-optimisation mechanisms.

Controls

Move: A/D

Jump: Space

Grab: Shift

Restart level: R

Extra assets

Made for Ludum Dare 51 where the theme was Every 10 seconds
